member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.Parent
member.summary: Gets the PathStructure representation of the current path's parent directory.

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.Children
member.summary: Enumerates the PathStructure objects the represent the current path's child filesystem objects.

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.Variables
member.summary: Gets a list of variables in the current path and their values.
member.value: Key is variable name. Value is the variable value.

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.UNCPath
member.summary: Gets the UNC formatted path of the current path

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.Type
member.summary: Gets the current path's path type, an enum of PathType (File or Folder)

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.DefaultPath
member.summary: Gets the default (or root) directory for the current Structure.

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.StartPath
member.summary: Gets the current path with replaced variables.

member.name: M:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.IsDescendantOfDefaultPath
member.summary: Determines if the current instance of a PathStructure is a descendant of the DefaultPath (or root directory)

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.StructureCandidate.XPath
member.summary: Gets the XPath for the candidate

member.summary: Gets the XmlElement reference for the candidate

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.StructureCandidate.StructurePath

member.summary: Gets the objects URI string

member.name: P:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.StructureCandidate.StructureDescription
member.summary: Gets the description as specified in the path structure

member.name: M:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.IsLocationValid(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Determines if the current path is valid according to the provided Path Structure node.
member.param: The Path Structure node to check against the current path.

member.name: M:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.GetStructureTypefromXPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a full XPath from a absolute or relative XPath.
